summary: REQ-3 (Reminders) and REQ-4 (toggleable completion alerts) appear to be implemented via new reminders feature files and a TimerAlerts provider/settings wired into multiple timer types. REQ-1 (timers continue across tab switches) is likely addressed by force-mounting timer tabs (per diff summary notes), though the App.tsx diff is truncated. REQ-2 (primary button color #9E1C37) is partially addressed by updating CSS theme tokens, but the diff does not clearly show an explicit hex-based primary background being applied, so exact computed color compliance cannot be confirmed from the summary alone.
